Possessed By the Devil?

Today on an episode of Real Ghost Stories Online that was the inspiration for the 1998 hit single, back that ass up. Damn, those were some good rhymes. I wrote them myself actuallyâ€¦ Girl, you look good, won't you back that azz up

You'se a fine motherfucker, won't you back that azz up

Call me Big Daddy when you back that azz up

Hoe, who is you playin wit? Back that azz up

Pure poetry for the decades. Anyway,Â 

When a young person feels as though they are losing control of their life due to drugs and alcohol, they soon suspect that there may be something else at play.Â 

Something, demonic.Â 

Once this realization is made, are they able to escape the grasps of the devil himself?Â 

Weâ€™ll find out today, on Real Ghost Stories Online.
